useCase.name: Feature Prioritization and Confirmation
useCase.description: Team Member accesses the feature backlog from CMS, consults prioritization criteria, applies criteria to features, shares filtered features with Designer, consults Engineer for technical feasibility, updates prioritized features list, and shares it with Engineer and Designer.

preconditions.precondition: Feature backlog is accessible in CMS

useCase.trigger: Team Member initiates feature prioritization process

mainSequence.step: Team Member accesses Feature Backlog in CMS
Team Member applies Criteria to Features
Team Member shares Filtered Features with Designer
Team Member consults Engineer for Technical Feasibility
Team Member updates Prioritized Features List in CMS
Team Member shares Prioritized Features List with Engineer
Team Member shares Prioritized Features List with Designer
